Original:
很爛
和朋友來看世足冠軍賽，提早快一個月訂位置，店家要求15號以後就不能退費，並且如果退費要多收手續費，一個人收1000塊，但這些都沒關係，只要體驗是好的就好。
但會發負評就代表完全沒有體驗，一入場除了VIP，其他所有人都是坐塑膠板凳，塑膠椅擺的很擠，大家進進出出的時候都會擠到，搞的像在看廟會表演，給了酒品兌換卷2張但也沒有桌子，請問到底是要怎麼喝？
在預約時完全沒有提到位置的問題，到場時也有聽到很多客人都很傻眼，我相信沒有一個人會預想到花1000塊坐廟會椅子還沒有桌子+很擠，難怪要15號以前才能退費==，是多怕跑單，明明整個就是裡面空間不夠還要硬加多人。1000塊換到這種環境真的很糟糕。
p.s.後來問店家，他們這種叫做「觀影模式」，請各位小心^^。

Rotten
Look at the World Football Championship with friends, and set the location for one month in advance. The store requires that the fee will not be refunded after the 15th, and if the refund fee is required to charge more, it will collect 1,000 yuan, but these are okay. As long as the experience is good, it is good to be good Just as good.
However, the negative evaluation means that there is no experience at all. Except for VIP, everyone else is sitting on a plastic bench. The plastic chair is crowded. , I gave 2 of the wine exchanges, but there were no tables. How do I drink it?
When I made an appointment, I did not mention the problem at all. When I was present, I heard that many guests were dumbfounded. I believe that no one would expect that it was expected to spend 1,000 seats in a temple fair chair. Fees ==, how are you afraid of running orders? Obviously, the whole space inside is not enough and it is hard to add more.It is really bad to replace this environment for 1,000 yuan.

Original:
正在海外旅行，想找個地方觀看 F1 拉斯維加斯大獎賽。

雞翅又脆又多汁。  然而，有點失望的是，當天下午所有的混合飲料都無法訂購。

最後，女服務生可以更有個性，讓體驗更愉快。

總的來說，如果您想在電視上觀看現場比賽，那麼這裡是一個不錯的選擇。  （記得提前打電話預約）
EN:
Traveling overseas and want to find a place to watch the F1 Las Vegas Grand Prix.

Call and get a booking to ensure the location.On Sunday afternoon, this place has limited space and is full of F1 fans.

Chicken wings are crispy and juicy.However, it was a bit disappointed that all mixed drinks that afternoon could not be ordered.

Finally, female waiters can have more individuality and make experience more pleasant.

In general, if you want to watch the scene on TV, then this is a good choice.(Remember to call in advance to make an appointment)

Original: 非常好的體育酒吧，播放英超聯賽和其他歐洲足球比賽，可能還有其他大型體育賽事。在大型比賽期間，您可以看到這裡半滿或滿座，當地人和外國人都有。
EN: Very good sports bar, playing the Premier League and other European football games, there may be other large sports events.During large -scale games, you can see half full or full, locals and foreigners.

Original: 英國的精釀啤酒好好喝，週五的晚上，跟朋友來看HBL，環境很不錯。
EN: British craft beer has a good taste. On Friday night, I came to see HBL with friends, and the environment was very good.

Original: 我們在台北旅行時，仔細尋找了舉辦F1比賽的酒吧。坐了一個小時的火車才找到這個地方，卻發現一家汽車俱樂部把整間酒吧租了一整晚。工作人員非常樂於助人，四處打電話尋找舉辦比賽的酒吧，但我們也詢問該俱樂部是否在本賽季的每場比賽中都租用了酒吧。他說他們做到了。因此，儘管他們的網站宣傳可以觀看 F1 比賽，但實際上在本賽季剩餘時間裡他們不會向公眾開放。只是以為我們會把它傳遞下去，這樣就沒有其他人試圖去那裡了。
EN: When we were traveling in Taipei, we carefully looked for a bar for the F1 competition.After taking an hour of train to find this place, I found that a car club rented the entire bar for a whole night.The staff is very helpful and calls to find a bar for the competition, but we also ask whether the club rented a bar in every game of this season.He said they did it.Therefore, although their website promotion can watch the F1 competition, they will actually not be open to the public in the remaining time this season.I just thought we would pass it on so that no one else tried to go there.

Original: 很棒的威士忌選擇！非常友好的服務。 5 個螢幕可供觀賞足球比賽。強烈推薦！

Original: 我們在查理家度過了一個愉快的夜晚觀看體育比賽。我去過亞洲最好的運動酒吧。 Hide 熱情好客，確保所有客人都感到舒適，並容納了我們想觀看的所有不同體育賽事。我建議您在繁忙的夜晚提前預訂，包括 EPL、F1 和德甲聯賽。我們一定會回來的！
EN: We spent a pleasant night watching sports competition at Charlie's house.I have been to the best sports bar in Asia.Hide is enthusiastic hospitality, ensuring that all guests feel comfortable and accommodate all different sports events we want to watch.I suggest you book early on a busy night, including EPL, F1 and the Bundesliga.We will definitely come back!

Original: 觀看英超聯賽的好地方。我在台灣訪問期間看了幾場托特納姆熱刺隊的比賽，遇到了一對非常友善且頑固的托特納姆熱刺球迷！

Original:
我來過這裡兩次。他們有比利時啤酒。大薯條和很多螢幕，所以如果你一個人來這裡也不會感到尷尬。適合消磨時間。

我最近嘗試過他們的雞尾酒：莫斯科騾子和邊車。 Mule 裡少了點東西，我是不是漏掉了什麼？無論如何，他們把剩下的薑汁啤酒裝在瓶子裡，但這對我來說並不能解決這個問題。 Side Car 恰到好處。

我對 Gmaps 的評價很高（3 到 5）。三顆星是有東西的。但他們值得享受大薯條、很多屏幕和良好的服務。我尊重這一點。

最低的、可能的比率是因為工作人員沒有表現出受到尊重，以一種非常微妙的方式，我仍然很欣賞。我知道期待小費很好。但這是您無法「竊取」的客戶特權。要有道德。按帳單退錢。這只是我第二次去那裡。另外，如果凌晨 3 點關門，那就以應有的時間說，而不是早 1 小時。

儘管如此，我想說這並不常見，所以你仍然可以在這裡期待美好的事情。
EN:
I have been here twice.They have Belgian beer.French fries and many screens, so if you come here alone, you will not feel embarrassed.Suitable for the time.

I have tried their cocktails recently: Moscow's mule and car.There is a little less in Mule, did I miss something?In any case, they put the remaining ginger beer in the bottle, but this could not solve this problem for me.SIDE CAR is just right.

My evaluation of GMAPS is very high (3 to 5).Three stars have something.But they deserve to enjoy big fries, many screens and good services.I respect this.

The lowest and possible ratio is because the staff did not show respect. In a very delicate way, I still appreciate it.I know the expectation tip is very good.But this is the customer privilege you cannot "steal".Moral.Pack out the bill.This is just the second time I have gone there.In addition, if you close the door at 3 in the morning, you should say it, not 1 hour early.

Nevertheless, I want to say that this is not common, so you can still look forward to good things here.

Original: 台北最好的運動酒吧。我們經常在 Charlie’s 觀看體育賽事，尤其是 F1，那裡的工作人員不僅製作飲料和食物，他們實際上知道自己在談論什麼。
